description: Try our easy to follow Smoothie Avocado Boat recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Smoothie & frapp√©,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Banana,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Avocado,Spinach
name: Smoothie Avocado Boat Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 bunch mint, leaves picked (plus extra sprigs to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Cut avocado in half lengthways and remove seed. Scoop out flesh using a large spoon, reserving skins. Slice half of the flesh and set aside.
Place remaining avocado, 1 of the bananas, spinach, mint, lime juice, coconut water and honey in a blender and blitz until smooth.
Pour into reserved avocado skins. Top with coconut, pepita seeds, reserved sliced avocado, reserved sliced banana and extra mint sprigs. Serve.
